lines.text:
[angrily frustrated, to a clueless Italian cobbler]
Tan! Y'understand tan?

[Talking to the tour group on the bus]
This tiny country of Holland is famous for Rembrandt, the tulip, the Edam cheese... also for Van Gogh, Dutch chocolate, Dutch beer, Dutch cleanser, the Dutch treat, the Dutch door, the Dutch uncle... In fact, folks, you're in Dutch!

[Trying to convince Samantha to stay with him in Europe]
Don't go back, Sam.
Charlie, I'm a square. I have to know where I'm headed. I can't just drift.
I don't understand it. How can you blow every penny you've saved for years on one lousy trip to Europe?
